data.comment: The match is underway at Providence Park.
Goal kick for Portland at Providence Park.
In the minute 1, Joseph Dickerson awards Colorado a goal kick.
Joseph Dickerson awards the away team a throw-in.
Portland advance rapidly upfield but Joseph Dickerson blows for offside.
In the minute 4, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Portland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
In the minute 8, Portland have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Portland.
Colorado have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
In the minute 11, Ball goes out of play for a Colorado goal kick.
In Portland, Andre Shinyashiki (Colorado) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Portland.
In the minute 14, Joseph Dickerson signals a Portland throw-in in Colorado's half.
Free kick for Portland in their own half.
Throw-in Portland.
In the minute 19, Portland needs to be cautious. Colorado have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Colorado in their own half.
In the minute 21, Colorado's Diego Rubio gets in a shot on goal at Providence Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ball goes out of play for a Colorado goal kick.
Throw-in for Colorado at Providence Park.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Portland in the half of Colorado.
Colorado awarded a free kick in their own half.
Portland push upfield but Joseph Dickerson quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 27, Corner awarded to Colorado.
Diego Rubio (Colorado) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Portland at Providence Park.
In the minute 29, Nicolas Benezet's header is off-target for Colorado.
Joseph Dickerson awards Portland a goal kick.
Portland's Bill Tuiloma breaks free at Providence Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 30, Colorado have a goal kick.
At Providence Park, Colorado are penalized for being offside.
Portland to take a throw-in in Colorado territory.
In the minute 32, Colorado awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
Ball safe as Colorado is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Colorado in their own half.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Colorado just outside Portland's area.
Diego Rubio (Colorado) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 38, Can Colorado capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Portland's half?
Colorado have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Can Colorado get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
In the minute 41, Joseph Dickerson signals a throw-in for Portland, close to Colorado's area.
Throw-in Portland.
Throw-in for Colorado in the half of Portland.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Colorado close to the penalty box.
Free kick Colorado.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
In the minute 45, Joseph Dickerson awards the away team a throw-in.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Portland.
Can Colorado get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Portland.
Joseph Dickerson has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Corner awarded to Colorado.
Giovanni Savarese is making the team's second substitution at Providence Park with Yimmi Chara replacing Andres Flores.
Throw-in for Portland at Providence Park.
In Portland a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Colorado in the half of Portland.
Diego Chara (Portland) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in high up the field for Colorado in Portland.
In the minute 50, Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Portland.
Ball goes out of play for a Colorado goal kick.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Portland in the half of Colorado.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Portland.
Can Portland capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Diego Valeri (Portland) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 55, Diego Valeri is replacing Eryk Williamson for the home team.
Corner awarded to Portland.
In the minute 58, Diego Chara (Portland) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Colorado have a goal kick.
Robin Fraser (Colorado) is making a first substitution, with Kellyn Acosta replacing Cole Bassett.
In the minute 58, The away team have replaced Nicolas Benezet with Jonathan Lewis. This is the second substitution made today by Robin Fraser.
Portland to take a throw-in in Colorado territory.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 62, Throw-in Portland.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Portland.
Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Colorado at Providence Park.
Joseph Dickerson signals a Portland throw-in in Colorado's half.
Goal kick for Colorado at Providence Park.
In the minute 65, Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Free kick Colorado.
Colorado have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 67, The match at Providence Park has been interrupted briefly for a check on Marco Farfan, who is down injured.
Portland make their third substitution with Jorge Villafana replacing Marco Farfan.
Portland are pushing forward but Yimmi Chara's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 69, Joseph Dickerson awards Colorado a goal kick.
Free kick for Colorado in their own half.
Joseph Dickerson awards Portland a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nicolas Mezquida is replacing Andre Shinyashiki for Colorado at Providence Park.
Portland's Jorge Villafana gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 75, Goal kick for Colorado at Providence Park.
Joseph Dickerson awards the away team a throw-in.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
In the minute 77, It's a goal kick for the away team in Portland.
Nicolas Mezquida is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Nicolas Mezquida is back on the pitch.
In the minute 79, In Portland a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Portland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Portland have a goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Colorado!
Portland will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Colorado.
In the minute 81, Pablo Bonilla is booked for the home team.
In the minute 82, Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
Goal! Colorado have got their heads in front thanks to a Kellyn Acosta strike.
That's a fine assist from Diego Rubio.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Portland at Providence Park.
The away team have replaced Younes Namli with Drew Moor. This is the fourth substitution made today by Robin Fraser.
Joseph Dickerson signals a throw-in for Portland, close to Colorado's area.
In the minute 87, Giovanni Savarese (Portland) is making a fourth substitution, with Dairon Asprilla replacing Andy Polo.
The home team replace Pablo Bonilla with Larrys Mabiala.
Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 89, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Joseph Dickerson awards Colorado a goal kick.
Nicolas Mezquida of Colorado smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Colorado.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Colorado have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Can Colorado capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Portland's half?
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Coloradoâ€™s William Yarbrough is on his feet again at Providence Park.
Ball goes out of play for a Colorado goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Portland. The final score is 0-1.
Nicolas Mezquida (Colorado) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Dario Zuparic (Portland) has received a yellow card from Joseph Dickerson.
Joseph Dickerson waits before resuming play because William Yarbrough for Colorado is still down.
